data.eml:eml: Coeliccia mientrung spec. nov. from Central Vietnam (Odonata: Platycnemididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kompier, Tom, Phan, Quoc Toan (2017): Coeliccia mientrung spec. nov. from Central Vietnam (Odonata: Platycnemididae). Zootaxa 4247 (2): 131-140, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.2.4
